landing.heroSubtitle: Create your digital storefront in 5 minutes. Showcase your work, list your services, sell products, and accept bookings â€” all from one beautiful link.
landing.featuresSubtitle: Replace your website, booking tool, and portfolio with one powerful link
landing.featurePortfolioDesc: Showcase your best work with a beautiful gallery. Let your skills speak for themselves.
landing.featureServicesDesc: Display all your services with prices and duration. Clients know exactly what to expect.
landing.featureBookingDesc: Accept appointments while you sleep. No more back-and-forth messages.
landing.featureProductsDesc: Sell hair care, skincare, or any products alongside your services.
landing.featureBrandingDesc: Custom colors, fonts, logo, and cover image. Make it uniquely yours.
landing.featureOneLinkDesc: Perfect for Instagram, Facebook, TikTok bio. All your info in one place.
landing.howItWorksSubtitle: No technical skills needed. Just sign up and customize.
landing.step1Desc: Sign up free and set up your business profile
landing.step2Desc: Upload photos, add services, set your hours
landing.step3Desc: Put your link everywhere and start getting bookings
landing.comparisonSave: Save money. Save time. Look professional.
landing.testimonial1: Finally, I have a professional online presence without paying for an expensive website. My clients love how easy it is to book!
landing.testimonial2: I put my BeautiPick link in my Instagram bio and bookings started coming in immediately. Game changer!
landing.testimonial3: The gallery feature is perfect for showing my work. New clients can see exactly what I can do before booking.
landing.ctaTitle: Ready to Get Your Salon Online?
landing.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of beauty professionals who've simplified their business

businessForm.customDomainSetup: How to set up your custom domain:
businessForm.customDomainStep1: Enter your domain name (e.g., yoursalon.com) above and save
